content.text: Add Text Components to the Article Structure

inlineContent.text: Components represent the content of your article, including the article’s title, introduction, byline, and body text.
The example code

file in News Preview to see your content on the simulated device, without any added styles or layout.

file. Do not change the file name.

inlineContent.text: A drop cap changes the size, position, and style of a text component’s first character, or first few characters. Before you can add a drop cap to a text component, you must define a style that has a drop cap.
